articles.author: Ana Diaz
articles.title: Star Wars: Knights of the Old Republic 2 can’t be completed on Switch
articles.description: Star Wars: Knights of the Old Republic 2: The Sith Lords has a game breaking bug that doesn’t allow players to complete the game on Nintendo Switch. Aspyr Media acknowledged the bug in a tweet.
articles.content:
The rage of The Sith is unending, and so are bugs in games. 
Star Wars: Knights of the Old Republic 2: The Sith Lords (KOTOR 2) was released over 17 years ago, but the Nintendo Switch port has a gam… [+969 chars]

articles.author: Michael McWhertor
articles.title: Call of Duty: Warzone season 4 will add The Terminator(s)
articles.description: Call of Duty: Vanguard and Warzone season 4’s battle pass for Mercenaries of Fortune will add new cosmetics, operators, and weapons — but also the Terminator T-800 and T-1000.
articles.content: Call of Duty: Vanguard and Warzones fourth season of content arrives this week, bringing with it a new battle pass, a new Operator, new weapons, and all manner of ornate cosmetics vampire skins, blue… [+1560 chars]

articles.author: Cass Marshall
articles.title: World of Warcraft Dragonflight expansion release window set for 2022
articles.description: World of Warcraft: Dragonflight is expected to release before the end of 2022, according to an announcement from Blizzard. The developer has opened pre-orders for the expansion.
articles.content: The next World of Warcraft expansion, Dragonflight, is set to launch later this year. While we still dont have an exact release date for the upcoming expansion, which takes place on the long-lost Dra… [+1343 chars]

articles.author: Austen Goslin
articles.title: League of Legends’ Star Guardians return for a new event next month
articles.description: Star Guardians, one of League of Legends’ most popular skin lines and spinoff universes, is coming back for a new event with a trailer and a July 14 release date.
articles.content: Its possible this could mean a whole new batch of Star Guardian skins

articles.author: Ana Diaz
articles.title: YouTuber makes the world’s largest Xbox Series X console
articles.description: YouTuber Michael Pick made the world’s largest, fully functional, Xbox Series X. Previously he was known for making a giant Nintendo Switch.
articles.content: But will it fit in your gaming setup?

articles.author: Owen S. Good
articles.title: Tiny Tina’s Wonderlands launches on Steam with new Molten Mirrors DLC
articles.description: Tiny Tina’s Wonderlands is now available for PC via Steam, three months after it launched on the Epic Games Store. The game’s third premium DLC, Molten Mirrors, also launched on June 21, 2022.
articles.content: Tiny Tinas Wonderlands next premium DLC pack, Molten Mirrors, launches on Thursday, June 23, the same day the full game launches on Steam, following a three-month timed exclusive on the Epic Games St… [+1319 chars]

articles.description: Kraven the Hunter hits theaters on January 13, 2023. Star Aaron Taylor-Johnson reveals how he sees the Spider-Man antagonist as an animal-loving antihero

articles.title: Xbox Game Pass titles for late June 2022
articles.description: Far Cry 5 hits on July 1, with Total War: Three Kingdoms, FIFA 22, and the Shadowrun Trilogy out in June. Also, FIFA 20 leaves at the end of the month.

articles.title: The Persona series will also come to Steam and PlayStation
articles.description: After Atlus’ announcement on Sunday that Persona 5 Royal, Persona 4 Golden, and Persona 3 Portable are coming to Xbox Game Pass, the studio revealed that the franchise will also come to PlayStation consoles and Steam.
